messages.msgSnippet: Thank you Francisco, I wrote from Paris and I must introduce myself for the group.I have a martial site    http://www.multimania.com/braunstein  involved only
messages.messageBody:
Thank you Francisco,
I wrote from Paris and I must introduce myself for the group.I have a
martial site http://www.multimania.com/braunstein involved only by
martial culture .
----------
(I practice japanese sword) and i am writing a book on the warrior'sbody
looking for informations about tatoo or make up but also by the body as a
technique of the body as it had been designed by Mauss.I have wrote twoo
books about martial arts one in Presses Universitaires de France and the
other in l'Harmattan.
Thank you to all of you if you can help me to find precisely texts speaking
about this subject and to Francisco

>De : "Francisco Manuel Luna Zapata" <swarzdraken@...>
>À : samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com
>Objet : Re: [samuraihistory] Re : <aucun objet>
>Date : Ven 25 jan 2002 4:06
>

> Dear Florence:
> My name is Francisco Luna, I am from Colombia, i could help you with some
> titles of books about samurais.
>
> 1. BUSHIDO, SOUL OF JAPAN, AUTHOR: INAZO NITOBE.
> 2. ZEN AND JAPANESE CULTURE.
> 3. HAGAKURE, THE SAMURAIS BOOK'S. AUTHOR: MIYAMOTO TSUNEMOTO.
>
> THIS BOOKS ARE EXCELLENT, AND COUL HELP YOU TO ANSWER BOTH QUESTION
>
>
> ATN: FRANCISCO MANUEL LUNA ZAPATA
>
>
